OOC:Zergling is not in the battlefield. He is in the engine room 
loking for bombs


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@p...> 
wrote:
> *The plasma blast hit Kamodia and than she turns facing Zergling
anf 
fires
> her Bazooka at him*
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, July 25, 2000 8:55 AM
> Subject: Re: (no subject)
> 
> 
> > ::Zardus/DevilDuer/Scavanger/Hiss::
> >
> > Hiss dives under one of the fireballs, the other hitting him in 
the
> shoulder.
> > He yells in rage, about to fire at Arcangel when multiple shots 
hit him in
> > the back. He growls, diving quickly and firing at Arcangel.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Scavanger puts his hand up to protect his face as the flame hits 
him,
> yelling
> > in pain as the flame turns his skin black. He growls, firing back 
at
> > Icedragon from his rifle.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Zardus flies up to the Alliance base, his head nearly getting 
blown off by
> > flying debree from an autogun. He looks around, seeing Arcangel, 
Icedemon,
> > Shocker, and Kamodia attacking the base. He looks down at his 
scanners,
> > seeing the Alliance members dealing with some Maximals in the 
torture
> > chambers.
> >
> > "Zergling, DevilDuer," he says into his comm-link, "Get out here 
and help
> > defend the base."
> >
> > With that, he turns toward Kamodia, firing his plasma launcher at 
her.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > DevilDuer opens his eyes, looking down at himself. He wasn't in 
too good a
> > shape, mechfluid leaking from his wounds and a headache in his 
head. He
> > growls as he hears Zardus' transmission. Couldn't he get some 
rest?
> >
> > DevilDuer gets to his feet, using a tree branch for support. He 
walks out
> of
> > the forest and toward the Alliance base, firing at Shocker.
> >
> >
